blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

tags: the continued saga of socially inept beau and her tutor fjord
summary:
Beau: Oh, so now I'm supposed to "be nice" and "make friends" and "treat them with mutual respect"?
Fjord: ...Yes.
Beau: That's...
body:
Beau: Oh, so now I'm supposed to "be nice" and "make friends" and "treat them with mutual respect"?
Fjord: ...Yes.
Beau: That's EXACTLY what they want me to do, Fjord! WAKE UP.
